inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdatePendingUpdatesV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where LastDeploymentChangeTime < now(-40d)
| where Computer != ""
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, KBPublished = LastDeploymentChangeTime, Title=Title_, KB, CollectionTime
| sort by Computer asc
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"CLIENTS WITH PENDING UPDATES OLDER THAN 40 DAYS | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo6470D-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo6470D-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdateLastResultsV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where LastInstallationSuccessDate < ago(40d)
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, LastInstallationSuccessDate, LastSearchSuccessDate, CollectionTime
| sort by Computer asc
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"LAST WINDOWS UPDATE MORE THAN 40 DAYS AGO | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo6470D-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo6470D-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdatePendingUpdatesV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where LastDeploymentChangeTime < now(-40d)
| where DriverClass notcontains "Drivers"
| sort by Computer asc
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"CLIENTS WITH PENDING UPDATES OLDER THAN 40 DAYS, NO DRIVERS | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo6470D-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo6470D-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdateServiceManagerV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer, Name
| where Name contains "Microsoft Update"
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, Name, IsDefaultAUService, IsManaged
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()
","size":0,"title":"UPDATE SOURCE MICROSOFT UPDATE | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo6470D-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo6470D-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"blue"}},"showBorder":false}}
